title: Programmer/Analyst
responsibilities: Developed a custom Framework and Platform using C#.Net for use in a cutting-edge EHR.
Created an admin portal for EHR governance using WPF.
Maintained and upgraded security measures for a variety of apps, including integration of SSO via AD Federated Identity using OAuth 2 and OpenID Connect.
Produced an API for healthcare applications, using ASP.NET Web API and ASP.Net Core MVC.
Implemented enterprise level messaging and eventing systems implemented via Azure web apps.

title: Programmer/Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Created a cross platform Android/iOS app for clinic patients using Xamarin.
Designed back-end API hosted on Microsoft Azure.

Produced a backing data store using Microsoft SQL Server hosted on Azure.

title: Mobile Development Intern
responsibilities: Developed the publically availible Menards application for both iOS and Android.
